response.overview: See the Overwatch™ animated shorts on the big screen! Coke® eSports, Blizzard Entertainment, and Cinemark® Theatres are teaming up to give you a chance to enjoy the stories of Winston, Widowmaker, and other Overwatch heroes in a whole new way. To celebrate the game’s launch, select theaters in the United States will be showing the shorts for one night only on the 22nd of May. An exclusive developer panel will also be shown, giving you a behind-the-scenes look at the heroes and lore of the Overwatch universe. This one-of-a-kind viewing experience will be the best way for you and your friends to come together to celebrate the launch of Blizzard’s game. Every participant will receive limited edition swag. You won’t want to miss your opportunity to see Overwatch in full, big-screen glory!
response.title: Overwatch Launch Celebration
